results.title: Nick Martinez and Spencer Steer just miss making history in Reds' 8-1 win over Padres
results.description: CINCINNATI — The Cincinnati Reds were on the verge of making history twice Friday night against the San Diego Padres.

results.title: How Manchester City dismantled Juventus with straight passes and diagonal runs
results.description: Guardiola said it had been a 'long time' since his team had a performance like their win over Juventus. We break down how they did it...

results.title: High-Priced Buccaneers Cornerback Could be Trade Bait Ahead of 2025
results.description: Tampa Bay Buccaneers corner Jamel Dean could be headed west in the latest NFL trade rumor.
